title: Why am I getting the Inactivity Notification?
body: So ever since the season ended I haven't really played league much. I logged in and I see I have the Inactivity Notification for decay in ranked. I don't quite understand considering ranked season is over. I played one game of Flex just now to see if that was the problem but I'm still getting the notification. Can someone help?

replies.body: It's just leftovers from the previous season, but rest assured that there's no decay enabled.  Per the [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ), inactivity and decay is disabled until the next season starts.  Hope that helps bring some ease!
Thank you. I was just confused considering this has never happened to me for the past couple of seasons I played.
Can confirm that i'm getting this too, glad to know :)
